column4: when I edit a BAT file created in Windows with the ubuntu text editor, on Windows, it appears messed up with blocks in the code - is there something i can do to correct thiis?
you have also tofrodos for WIn -> Linux
it says no manual entry for todos
then do i just do like, "fromdos xpinstall.bat" ?
use todos -b file.bat . where -b is for backup
so, after editing the file in ubuntu, i run this command, and it should appear correctly in windows?
